name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.arcTo
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.arcTo() method of the Canvas 2D API adds a circular arc to the current sub-path, using the given control points and radius. The arc is automatically connected to the path's latest point with a straight line, if necessary for the specified parameters.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.arcTo' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
